short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the beauty of nature to your browsing experience with Golden Bloom Theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring a vibrant design of golden yellow flowers interwoven with lush green leaves, this extension adds a warm and cheerful atmosphere to your browser. Perfect for nature lovers, it enhances visual appeal while maintaining a clean and minimalist interface. Brighten your day every time you open a new tab!
